Package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.handlers

Interface MultiBlockInteractionHandler

All Superinterfaces:
ItemHandler
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface MultiBlockInteractionHandler extends ItemHandler
This ItemHandler is called whenever a Player interacts with this MultiBlock. Note that this MultiBlockInteractionHandler should be assigned to a class that inherits from MultiBlockMachine.
Author:
TheBusyBiscuit
